description:
Viscount Gerlach was the Minister of Finance of the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] during the reign of http://anidb.net/ch206 [Friedrich IV]. After the fall of the Goldenbaum Dynasty, he was replaced by http://anidb.net/ch822 [Eugen Richter] as the finance minister.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Gerlach
